query:
INSERT INTO edc_chemicals (cas_number, chemical_name, common_names, chemical_class, edc_category, hormone_systems_affected, health_effects, common_sources, exposure_routes, bioaccumulation_potential, regulatory_status, epa_data) VALUES
('94-75-7', '2,4-Dichlorophenoxyacetic acid', '["2,4-D"]', 'Herbicide', 'confirmed', '["thyroid", "reproductive"]', 'Thyroid hormone disruption, reproductive effects', '["Pesticides", "Lawn care products", "Agricultural use"]', '["dermal", "inhalation", "ingestion"]', 'low', 'EPA registered pesticide, restricted use', '{"docket_number": "EPA-HQ-OPP-2012-0330", "tier_1_screening": "completed", "tier_2_recommended": true, "screening_date": "2015-09-23"}'),
('1912-24-9', 'Atrazine', '["AAtrex"]', 'Triazine herbicide', 'confirmed', '["reproductive", "thyroid", "adrenal"]', 'Reproductive toxicity, thyroid disruption, hormonal imbalances, linked to birth defects', '["Herbicides", "Agricultural runoff", "Drinking water contamination", "Lawn care"]', '["ingestion", "dermal", "inhalation"]', 'moderate', 'EPA registered herbicide, banned in EU, restricted in some US states', '{"docket_number": "EPA-HQ-OPP-2013-0266", "tier_1_screening": "completed", "tier_2_recommended": true, "notes": "One of most studied EDCs"}'),
('2921-88-2', 'Chlorpyrifos', '["Dursban", "Lorsban"]', 'Organophosphate insecticide', 'confirmed', '["thyroid", "reproductive"]', 'Neurodevelopmental effects, thyroid disruption, reproductive toxicity, linked to ADHD in children', '["Pesticides", "Agricultural use", "Formerly in residential pest control"]', '["ingestion", "inhalation", "dermal"]', 'moderate', 'Residential use banned (2000), agricultural use banned (2021)', '{"docket_number": "EPA-HQ-OPP-2008-0850", "tier_1_screening": "completed", "tier_2_recommended": true, "notes": "Significant neurotoxic effects"}'),
('63-25-2', 'Carbaryl', '["Sevin"]', 'Carbamate insecticide', 'confirmed', '["thyroid", "reproductive", "adrenal"]', 'Thyroid disruption, reproductive effects, neurotoxicity', '["Insecticides", "Garden products", "Pet flea treatments", "Agricultural use"]', '["dermal", "inhalation", "ingestion"]', 'low', 'EPA registered pesticide', '{"docket_number": "EPA-HQ-OPP-2010-0230", "tier_1_screening": "completed", "tier_2_recommended": true}'),
('82657-04-3', 'Bifenthrin', '["Talstar", "Brigade"]', 'Pyrethroid insecticide', 'confirmed', '["thyroid", "reproductive"]', 'Thyroid disruption, reproductive toxicity, neurotoxicity', '["Insecticides", "Residential pest control", "Agricultural use", "Termite treatment"]', '["dermal", "inhalation", "ingestion"]', 'high', 'EPA registered pesticide, restricted use', '{"docket_number": "EPA-HQ-OPP-2010-0384", "tier_1_screening": "completed", "tier_2_recommended": true}');
